welcome_message_body: "Welcome to West Deer, the charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and warm community. We hope you enjoy your stay and explore all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Butler County - Kenny Scholter Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Allegheny County Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Allegheny County Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pittsburgh International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is dedicated to domestic flights operated by American Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves domestic flights operated by Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is used for domestic flights operated by United Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D is primarily used for international flights and also serves as a hub for Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beaver Falls Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Beaver Falls Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.
